Test Name: Organic Acid Test (OAT), Immunoglobulin E (IGE), and Serum Chemistry
Purpose: To quantify organic acids, immunoglobulin E levels, and routine biochemical analytes for assessment of metabolic function, allergy status, and overall health.
Equipment: Gas Chromatograph-Mass Spectrometer (GC-MS), Automated immunoanalyzer, Clinical Chemistry Analyzer
